title: Emmerdale viewers point out major hint that Nate is a Dingle
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Nate Robinson has certainly caused a stir with Emmerdale viewers ever since he stepped onto Emmerdale, but his relationship has sparked fury from many watching.

Unsurprisingly, there has been much speculation as to the mysterious farmhand's true identity, and some fans are convinced that they've found proof he is a Dingle after last night's episode.

Moira was fretting over Pete moving out after discovering her sordid affair with Nate (Jurell Carter) and the pair sat down to chat about the situation.

"There's no talking Pete around," Moira said, upset. "Bear and Matty are taking his stuff around to the B&B."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

"Maybe it's a good thing he's shipping out," Nate replied and put his hands over hers. "The last thing we need is him breathing down our necks."

Moira retorted: "He disapproves because he cares about me."

"I care too," he insisted.

However Moira pulled away from him and implored that he give her some space.

"We've got space with Pete gone," Nate replied. "No one suspects a thing."

However Moira exploded saying that it was a "wake up call" for her and suggested that they end things.

(Image: ITV)

As she got up and walked off, Nate let out a burst of rage and slammed his hand against one of the chairs.

And some eagle-eyed fans were convinced that he was beginning to show some very typical Dingle traits.

One tweeted: "Theory. Last night we saw a hint of Nate’s temper. Hmm I wonder where he gets that from? (see gif) One way or another, Nate is a Dingle #Emmerdale #twitter."

While another commented: "Temper temper Nate #Emmerdale."

(Image: ITV)

A third remarked: "#emmerdale nate is an effing psycho. Bin him off moira."

Actress Sally Dexter, who plays Cain's mum Faith, told Mirror TV at the Inside Soap Awards earlier this week that there would be a huge twist regarding Nate's true identity.

She said: ""Yes, there is a very shocking twist with Nate's identity and it has dire consequences for my son Cain, for Moira my daughter-in-law, and me.

"We have to come through a heavy storm and some of us might not make it. It was some of the most harrowingly emotional scenes I've ever done."

*Emmerdale returns on Monday at 7pm on ITV
description: Fans were convinced they found proof during last night's Emmerdale episode
